New Chairman of C.C., UAWK Elected 
    Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- The 48th plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK), which was held in Pyongyang Friday, discussed the organizational issues of recalling members of the central leadership of the union or filling vacancies in it.
 The meeting relieved Sung Sang Sop of the chairmanship of the C.C., the UAWK and elected Kang Chang Uk to replace him.

DPRK Governmental Economic Trade Delegation Leaves for China
    Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- A DPRK governmental economic trade delegation headed by Rim Kyong Man, minister of Foreign Trade, Saturday left here to visit China.
 It was seen off at the Pyongyang Railway Station by Vice-Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Ryong Nam and Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Wu Donghe.

Greetings to President of Burkina Faso
    Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Blaise Compaore, president of Burkina Faso, on the occasion of its national day.
 The message wished the president greater success in his work for the development and prosperity of the country, expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries will grow stronger in the future.

Protocol Signed between DPRK and China
    Beijing, December 10 (KCNA) -- A protocol of the 40th meeting of the Inter-Governmental Committee on Scientific and Technological Cooperation between the DPRK and China was signed here today.
 Present there from the DPRK side were members of the DPRK government scientific and technological delegation led by Ri Ui Gu, vice-president of the Academy of Sciences, and from the Chinese side were Wu Zhongze, vice-minister of Science and Technology, and officials concerned.
